column4: I'm on dialup, so, its not so easy to re-download 90 MB . . . in fact, its really annoying.
ljl, I'm a linux user, I have been for quite some time, but I have to use windows from time to timem so give me a break please
ljl I'm just asking general knowledge here.
I have it on my laptop.
have you tried wget -c to download the remainder of the file?
I can't do a direct link, thye have some sort of protection against that
sorry - i type slower than i read :)
a nd I said I'm on dialup, I can't redownload it without waiting 8 hours :P
so, does anyone know of a program that will attempt to extract corrupted zip files?
winrar is far from the best.
some hosts just check the "referrer" header to limit direct downloads. This can be forged by wget.
